name: Shree Polytech
overview:
“Shree Polytech Industries” is a well-known organization in the field of Polymer Products. We are proud to introduce ourselves as a manufacturer, supplier and exporter of a wide range of Plastic Products. We bring forth products like plastic granules, plastic green net, plastic string.

Our Products: Sun Shade Net Plastic Green Net Plastic White Net Plastic Blue Net Shade Cover Net Garden Shade Net Agro Shade Net Greenhouse Cover Net Plastic Granule Plastic String

Vision: “To be a growth oriented company with a firm commitment of caring for quality and environment.”

Mission: “Our Mission is to increase current capacities and its downstream operation to achieve economies of scale and to establish ourselves as a producer quality product through continual improvement in performance, meeting with the customers’ expectation and strive for developing value added option from side stream by products.”

Our Team: We have an exceptionally professional and competent team comprised of specialists in management, internet marketing, content management and communication.

Our Quality: We are leading manufacturer, supplier & exporter of plastic products in international and domestic market with quality and quantity.

Warehousing: We have a spacious warehouse that is loaded with all the advanced facilities required for the safe & sound storage of the utility products. The internal segmentation of the warehouse as per the category of the products ensures timely delivery of the products as the products are staked accordingly to the category.
